step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movements are generally good, but try to bring your shoulder blades back and down a bit more smoothly. Focus on the circular motion.
Good job on the circular motion! Ensure you're squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down. Keep the movement controlled.
You're doing great with the repetitions! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit for your breathing and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to breathe deeply as you do this to help with lymphatic flow.
